instructions:
Thaw the sole fillets enough to separate and arrange in a buttered 6 x 10 inch Pyrex baking dish. Dash
with pepper and dot with butter. In a bowl combine soup, Sherry and half of the Parmesan cheese. Stir in the
shrimp and spread the mixture over the fillets. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and a few shakes of paprika.
Bake in a 400 F oven for 20 to 22 minutes or until bubbly. Serve with cooked rice. Serves 2. 
*(Rev. 5/20/95)*
ingredients: 1 can (10 3/4 oz) Campbell's Cream of Shrimp soup
name: Shrimp & Sole
creator: Mary Decker
